H0.text: To make it easy to carry is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H1.text: To keep it simple to build is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H2.text: To make the screen easy to read is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H3.text: To provide storage for an electrical cord is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

A4.text: They can be folded shut for convenient storage and transportation, making them suitable for mobile use.

A5.text: Laptops are less durable than desktops/PCs.

A6.text: Ultrabooks were generally small enough compared to average laptop models to qualify as subnotebooks.

A7.text: The Ultrabook would be a thin (less than 0.8 inches thick) notebook that utilized Intel processors, and would emphasize portability and a longer battery life than other laptops.
